languages.text: Используйте голограмму, чтобы оценить эффективность предстоящих действий в бою до совершения действия. Выберите клетку на поле боя и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}, чтобы разместить голограмму персонажа. Выберите {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночный выстрел{/g}, чтобы посмотреть на ожидаемый эффект от их использования — он будет исходить от голограммы и позволит оценить, удачно ли вы выбрали место для запланированного действия. Также голограмма позволяет узнать, окажется ли враг в зоне вашей видимости после перемещения на выбранную клетку. Чтобы подтвердить выбор и совершить выбранное действие, нажмите {console_bind|Confirm} еще раз. Для отмены выбора нажмите {console_bind|Decline}.

traits.locale_text:
Используйте голограмму, чтобы оценить эффективность ваших действий в бою до совершения действия.
Выберите клетку на поле боя и нажмите { console_bind | Confirm } чтобы разместить голограмму персонажа. Выберите способность или одиночный выстрел, чтобы посмотреть на ожидаемый эффект от их использования.
Чтобы подтвердить выбор и совершить выбранное вами действие, нажмите { console_bind | Confirm } еще раз. Для отмены выбора нажмите клавишу { console_bind | Decline }.

languages.text:
You can use the hologram to gauge the effectiveness of your intended actions in combat before taking them.
Select a cell on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm} to place the character's hologram there. Select an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack to see the expected outcome. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. The hologram also lets you see if the enemy will be within your {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} after you move to the selected cell.
Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and execute the selected action. Press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.
languages.original_text: Используйте голограмму, чтобы оценить эффективность предстоящих действий в бою до совершения действия. Выберите клетку на поле боя и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}, чтобы разместить голограмму персонажа. Выберите {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночный выстрел{/g}, чтобы посмотреть на ожидаемый эффект от их использования — он будет исходить от голограммы и позволит оценить, удачно ли вы выбрали место для запланированного действия. Также голограмма позволяет узнать, окажется ли враг в зоне вашей видимости после перемещения на выбранную клетку. Чтобы подтвердить выбор и совершить выбранное действие, нажмите {console_bind|Confirm} еще раз. Для отмены выбора нажмите {console_bind|Decline}.

traits.locale_text:
You can use the hologram to gauge the effectiveness of your intended actions in combat before taking them.
Select a cell on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm} to place the character's hologram there. Select an ability or a single-shot attack to see the expected outcome of their use. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. The hologram also lets you see if the enemy will be within your line of sight after you move to the selected cell.
Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and execute the selected action. Press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.

You can use the hologram to gauge the effectiveness of your intended actions in combat before taking them.
Select a cell on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm} to place the character's hologram there. Select an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack to see the expected outcome. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. The hologram also lets you see if the enemy will be within your {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} after you move to the selected cell.
Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and execute the selected action. Press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.

Select a cell on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm} to place the character's hologram there. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. The hologram also lets you see if the enemy will be within your {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} after you move to the selected cell.
Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and execute the selected action. Press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.

You can use the hologram to gauge the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effectiveness{/g} of your intended actions in combat before taking them.
Select a cell on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm} to place the character's hologram there. Select an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack to see the expected outcome. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. The hologram also lets you see if the enemy will be within your {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} after you move to the selected cell.
Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and execute the selected action. Press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.

You can use the hologram to gauge the effectiveness of your intended actions in combat before taking them.
Select a cell on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm} to place the character's hologram there. Select an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack to see the expected outcome. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. The hologram also lets you see if the enemy will be within your {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} after you move to the selected cell.
Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and execute the selected action. Press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.

languages.text:
Puedes hacer uso del holograma para medir la efectividad de tus acciones en combate antes de llevarlas a cabo.
Elige una casilla del escenario y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm} para colocar el holograma del personaje ahí mismo. Elige una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} o un ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}un solo disparo{/g} para ver el resultado esperado. Se mostrará la acción desde la ubicación del holograma para ayudarte a valorar si se trata de la posición más idónea para la acción que piensas ejecutar. El holograma, igualmente, te permite ver si el enemigo estará dentro de tu {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} una vez que te muevas a la casilla seleccionada.
Vuelve a pulsar {console_bind|Confirm} para confirmar tu decisión y ejecutar la acción seleccionada. Pulsa {console_bind|Decline} para cancelarla.
languages.original_text:
You can use the hologram to gauge the effectiveness of your intended actions in combat before taking them.
Select a cell on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm} to place the character's hologram there. Select an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack to see the expected outcome. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. The hologram also lets you see if the enemy will be within your {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} after you move to the selected cell.
Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and execute the selected action. Press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.

traits.locale_text:
Puedes hacer uso del holograma para medir la efectividad de tus acciones en combate antes de llevarlas a cabo.
Elige una casilla del escenario y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm} para colocar el holograma del personaje ahí mismo. Elige una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} o un ataque de un solo disparo para ver el resultado esperado. Se mostrará la acción desde la ubicación del holograma para ayudarte a valorar si se trata de la posición más idónea para la acción que piensas ejecutar. El holograma, igualmente, te permite ver si el enemigo estará dentro de tu {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} una vez que te muevas a la casilla seleccionada.
Vuelve a pulsar {console_bind|Confirm} para confirmar tu decisión y ejecutar la acción seleccionada. Pulsa {console_bind|Decline} para cancelarla.

languages.text:
ホログラムを使えば、戦闘中に意図したアクションを実行する前に、その効果を評価できる。
戦場のセルを選択し、{console_bind|Confirm}を押してキャラクターのホログラムを配置する。{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}攻撃を選択して、予想される結果を確認する。アクションは、ホログラムの位置から使用した様子が表示され、実行しようとしているアクションに対して効果的な位置を選択したかどうかを評価することができる。ホログラムでは、選択したセルに移動した後、敵が{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界{/g}内に入るかどうかも確認できる。
もう一度{console_bind|Confirm}を押して選択を確定し、選択したアクションを実行する。キャンセルしたい時は{console_bind|Decline}を押す。
languages.original_text:
You can use the hologram to gauge the effectiveness of your intended actions in combat before taking them.
Select a cell on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm} to place the character's hologram there. Select an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack to see the expected outcome. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. The hologram also lets you see if the enemy will be within your {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} after you move to the selected cell.
Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and execute the selected action. Press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.

traits.locale_text:
ホログラムを使えば、戦闘中に意図したアクションを実行する前に、その効果を評価できる。
戦場のセルを選択し、{console_bind|Confirm} を押してキャラクターのホログラムを配置する。{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}または単発射撃攻撃を選択して、予想される結果を確認する。アクションは、ホログラムの位置から使用した様子が表示され、実行しようとしているアクションに対して効果的な位置を選択したかどうかを評価することができる。ホログラムでは、選択したセルに移動した後、敵が{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界{/g}内に入るかどうかも確認できる。
もう一度 {console_bind|Confirm} を押して選択を確定し、選択したアクションを実行する。キャンセルしたい時は {console_bind|Decline}を押す。

languages.text:
在战斗中，您可以通过全息影像来衡量自己的预期行动是否会发挥作用。
在战场上选择某个格子，然后按下{console_bind|Confirm}，您的角色的全息影像就会显示在目标格子处。您可以选择{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}，查看预期结果。此次行动的具体情况会显示在角色的全息影像处，帮助您评估您执行的计划是否会发挥预期作用。此外，通过全息影像，您还可以看到当您移动至选定的格子之后，敌人是否会出现在您的{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}之中。
再次按下{console_bind|Confirm}可确认您的选择，执行选定的操作。按下{console_bind|Decline}可取消。
languages.original_text:
You can use the hologram to gauge the effectiveness of your intended actions in combat before taking them.
Select a cell on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm} to place the character's hologram there. Select an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack to see the expected outcome. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. The hologram also lets you see if the enemy will be within your {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} after you move to the selected cell.
Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and execute the selected action. Press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.

traits.locale_text:
在战斗中，您可以通过全息影像来衡量自己的预期行动是否会发挥作用。
在战场上选择某个格子，然后按下{console_bind|Confirm}，您的角色的全息影像就会显示在目标格子处。您可以选择{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}或单发攻击，查看预期结果。此次行动的具体情况会显示在角色的全息影像处，帮助您评估您执行的计划是否会发挥预期作用。此外，通过全息影像，您还可以看到当您移动至选定的格子之后，敌人是否会出现在您的{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}之中。
再次按下{console_bind|Confirm}，可确认您的选择，执行选定的操作。按下{console_bind|Decline}可取消。

languages.text:
Du kannst das Hologramm nutzen, um die Effektivität deiner geplanten Aktionen im Kampf abzuschätzen, bevor du sie ausführst.
Wähle ein Feld auf dem Schlachtfeld und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}, um das Hologramm des Charakters dort zu platzieren. Wähle eine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} oder einen {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g}-Angriff, um das erwartete Ergebnis zu sehen. Die Aktion wird so angezeigt, als würde sie von der Position des Hologramms ausgeführt, damit du einschätzen kannst, ob du eine effektive Position für die geplante Aktion gewählt hast. Das Hologramm zeigt dir auch an, ob sich der Gegner in deiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} befinden wird, nachdem du dich auf das ausgewählte Feld bewegt hast.
Drücke erneut {console_bind|Confirm}, um deine Wahl zu bestätigen und die gewählte Aktion auszuführen. Drücke {console_bind|Decline}, um sie abzubrechen.
languages.original_text:
You can use the hologram to gauge the effectiveness of your intended actions in combat before taking them.
Select a cell on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm} to place the character's hologram there. Select an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack to see the expected outcome. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. The hologram also lets you see if the enemy will be within your {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} after you move to the selected cell.
Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and execute the selected action. Press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.

traits.locale_text:
Du kannst das Hologramm nutzen, um die Effektivität deiner geplanten Aktionen im Kampf abzuschätzen, bevor du sie ausführst.
Wähle ein Feld auf dem Schlachtfeld und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}, um das Hologramm des Charakters dort zu platzieren. Wähle eine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} oder einen Einzelschuss-Angriff, um das erwartete Ergebnis zu sehen. Die Aktion wird so angezeigt, als würde sie von der Position des Hologramms aus ausgeführt, damit du einschätzen kannst, ob du eine effektive Position für die geplante Aktion gewählt hast. Das Hologramm zeigt dir auch an, ob sich der Gegner in deiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} befinden wird, nachdem du dich auf das ausgewählte Feld bewegt hast.
Drücke erneut {console_bind|Confirm}, um deine Wahl zu bestätigen und die gewählte Aktion auszuführen. Drücke {console_bind|Decline}, um sie abzubrechen.

languages.text:
Vous pouvez utiliser l'hologramme pour évaluer l'efficacité de vos actions en combat avant de les effectuer.
Sélectionnez une case sur le champ de bataille et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm} pour y placer l'hologramme du personnage. Sélectionnez une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ou une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}au coup par coup{/g} pour voir le résultat escompté. L'action envisagée sera affichée comme si elle était utilisée depuis l'emplacement de l'hologramme pour vous permettre de savoir si vous avez opté pour une position efficace. L'hologramme vous permet également de voir si l'ennemi sera dans votre {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} une fois que vous vous trouverez sur la case sélectionnée.
Appuyez à nouveau sur {console_bind|Confirm} pour confirmer votre choix et effectuer l'action sélectionnée. Appuyez sur {console_bind|Decline} pour l'annuler.
languages.original_text:
You can use the hologram to gauge the effectiveness of your intended actions in combat before taking them.
Select a cell on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm} to place the character's hologram there. Select an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack to see the expected outcome. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. The hologram also lets you see if the enemy will be within your {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} after you move to the selected cell.
Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and execute the selected action. Press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.

traits.locale_text:
Vous pouvez utiliser l'hologramme pour évaluer l'efficacité de vos actions en combat avant de les effectuer.
Sélectionnez une case sur le champ de bataille et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm} pour y placer l'hologramme du personnage. Sélectionnez une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ou une attaque au coup par coup pour voir le résultat escompté. L'action envisagée sera affichée comme si elle était utilisée depuis l'emplacement de l'hologramme pour vous permettre de savoir si vous avez opté pour une position efficace. L'hologramme vous permet également de voir si l'ennemi sera dans votre {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} une fois que vous vous trouverez dans la cellule sélectionnée.
Appuyez à nouveau sur {console_bind|Confirm} pour confirmer votre choix et effectuer l'action sélectionnée. Appuyez sur {console_bind|Decline} pour l'annuler.

languages.text:
Çatışmada planladığın eylemin etkililiğini o eylemi gerçekleştirmeden önce ölçmek için hologramı kullanabilirsin.
Çatışma alanında bir hücre seçip {console_bind|Confirm} düğmesine basarak karakterin hologramını oraya yerleştir. Beklenen sonucu görmek için bir {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} veya bir {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}tek atış{/g} saldırısı seç. Eylem, onun için etkili bir konum seçip seçmediğini değerlendirebilmen amacıyla hologramın bulunduğu yerden yapıyormuşsun gibi görüntülenecektir. Hologram ayrıca, seçtiğin hücreye ilerledikten sonra düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattın{/g} içinde olup olmayacağını da görmeni sağlar.
Seçimini onaylayarak eylemi gerçekleştirmek için tekrar {console_bind|Confirm} düğmesine bas. İptal etmek için {console_bind|Decline} düğmesine bas.
languages.original_text:

Select a cell on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm} to place the character's hologram there.
